manifest.help_text: Path to the reference manifest CSV.

selection_method.help_text: Method for sample selection; options are stepwise, random, or top.

index_prefix.help_text: Limit the COBS search to indexes that have this prefix, also restricts prefix of TAR files when extracting assemblies for tree building

number_of_cobs_matches.help_text: Number of matches to limit COBS search to.

publish_metadata.help_text: Flag to publish full metadata TSV.

filter_manifest.help_text: Path to filter manifest TSV for filtering samples on metadata.

short_metacsv_name.help_text: Remove full timestamp from filtered metadata CSV filename.

bin_ranges.help_text: Comma-separated list of bin edges, e.g., '0.98,0.99,0.995,0.998,1'.

retain_below_bins.help_text: Flag to keep samples that fall below bins.

cluster_method.help_text: Clustering method to use for samples in each bin; options are network_based or edge_based.

representatives.help_text: Number of representatives to select from each bin.

make_gif.help_text: Flag to create GIF visualization for choosing representatives when using network_based clustering method.

save_fastqc.help_text: Flag to save FastQC output files.

assembly_base.help_text: Base directory for xz-compressed TAR files containing assembly FASTAs, required for tree building

trim_tree.help_text: Use Treemmer to subset the tree.

number_of_leaves.help_text: Number of leaves to retain if trimming the tree.

download_fastq.help_text: Download FastQ files for samples (if available) and run QC.

output_all_fastqs.help_text: Output all downloaded FastQ files regardless of QC.
